kubeVersion.ui:title: Kubernetes Version
kubeVersion.ui:help: A SemVer range of compatible Kubernetes versions

description.ui:title: Description
description.ui:help: A single-sentence description of this project

keywords.ui:title: Keywords
keywords.ui:help: A list of keywords about this project

home.ui:title: Kubernetes Version
home.ui:help: A SemVer range of compatible Kubernetes versions

sources.ui:title: Description
sources.ui:help: A single-sentence description of this project

dependencies.ui:title: Dependencies
dependencies.ui:help: A list of the chart requirements

name.ui:title: Name
name.ui:help: The name of the chart, i.e. nginx

version.ui:title: Version
version.ui:help: The version of the chart, i.e. "1.2.3"

condition.ui:title: Condition
condition.ui:help: A yaml path that resolves to a boolean, used for enabling/disabling charts (e.g. subchart1.enabled )

tags.ui:title: Tags
tags.ui:help: Tags can be used to group charts for enabling/disabling together

import-values.ui:title: Import Values
import-values.ui:help: ImportValues holds the mapping of source values to parent key to be imported. Each item can be a string or pair of child/parent sublist items.

alias.ui:title: Alias
alias.ui:help: Alias to be used for the chart. Useful when you have to add the same chart multiple times

maintainers.ui:title: Maintainers
maintainers.ui:description: A list of mainteners for this project

icon.ui:title: Icon
icon.ui:help: A URL to an SVG or PNG image to be used as an icon

appVersion.ui:title: appVersion
appVersion.ui:help: The version of the app that this contains. Needn't be SemVer. Quotes recommended.

annotations.ui:title: Annotations
annotations.ui:help: A list of annotations keyed by name
